name: Extreme Pong
description:
Hey you !

Do you feel like your life lacks of something ?

Do you like excitement ?

Do you like explosions ?

Of course you do !

So download right now the perfect combination of simple gameplay mechanics and ludicrous effects !

Disclaimer : Just in case my sarcasm wasn't obvious enough, I made this game in a few hours because I needed to turn in a Pong game as an assignment, and I may have gone a little bit overboard.

Don't expect any updates, but who knows...
